text: Derviş Eroğlu (born March 7, 1938) is a Turkish Cypriot politician. He was the third President of Northern Cyprus.Northern Cyprus's new president: Enter Eroglu (The Economist) Retrieved on 1 June 2011. He was the Prime Minister (1985–94, 1996–2004 and again 2009–10) and twice-leader of the National Unity Party. He became President on 23 April 2010. He left the office on 30 April 2015. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Turkish politicians Category:Presidents of Northern Cyprus Category:Prime Ministers of Northern Cyprus
title: Derviş Eroğlu
